    RFID Solutions

    Identify mobile objects without batteries over a few meters with our radio frequency identification products.

    Read More

    Indoor Localization

    Quickly find objects like boxes, vehicles or people in your warehouse and production facilities.

    OEM Design

    Read More

    Making Things Communicate

    metraTec is a specialist for wireless electronics in the fields Identification (RFID), Realtime Localization (IPS/RTLS) and connectivity in the "Internet of Things" (IoT). With our products and services we help our customers world wide track their supply chains in real time, identify persons and objects and localize them in a building, connect devices to each other and the cloud as well as many more applications.

    If you have an idea for an innovative use of RF and communication technology and you're looking for a qualified and flexible partner, please contact us!

    Radiofrequency Identification (RFID)

    Identification of people and objects without line of sight and without batteries

    Indoor Localization

    Locate people and objects inside buildings for more efficient and secure company processes

    Internet of Things

    Components and solutions for data communication of industrial devices for the "Internet of Things" - via cable and wirelessly.

    OEM Design

    You've got a project where you need support with electronics design? We can help you with that!

    What we have achieved so far

    Different Products

    Hard Workers

    Selected Projects

    Selected Projects

    These are only some of our projects that we completed in the past

    Tracking Rental Items

    With help of our IPS technology, a rental company for construction equipment keeps track of the position of over 70.000 items on their 100+ rental stations in Germany.

    Production Tracking

    Using passive RFID we give an international producer of candy and sweets a real time overview of the last position of more then 10.000 pallets in their 10+ factories around the world including product status.

    Evacuation Management

    A national retail chain is using our indoor positioning system to increase the safety of their 1.000+ employees by tracking the evacuation process in case of fire in their main buildings.

    Consumable Management

    An international food cooperation is using our miniature UHF modules to check their consumables
